description: Learn how to make pizza dough from scratch. This traditional recipe requires just five ingredients.
name: Traditional Pizza Dough Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide dough in half and roughly roll each portion out until large enough to fit trays. Brush with remaining oil. Bake for 15 minutes or until dough is golden and crisp.
